item.description:
We have an open mike OPEN MIKE on Wednesday Nites from 7PM until around 10PM near the Galleria Mall in East Cambridge. This is a great opportunity to further your music experience and career, jam with other musicians, play solo, play originals, and network. The goal is to have everyone play as much as possible.

At present, this is more of a soft rock/folk singer songwriter, acoustic and soft electric open mike. The sign up procedure is basically RSVPing for this meetup, answer the questions if possible and then sign in when you arrive. It's important to note what time you plan to arrive for scheduling.

Anyone who would like accompanyment please submit 3 to 5 songs that you would like to play in order of priority, in the questions. If you would like to rehearse the songs with the group RSVP for and come to the jam/rehearsal meetup the Sunday prior to the Open MIke. If you can bring song sheets for your songs on one page that will facilitate playing. If you are playing at semi-professional level and are playing solo or don't need to rehearse, just come to the open mike.

I'm setting up an online group song repository spreadsheet for suggestions and voting, for the regular players. Then we can determine the songs everyone likes most & focus on them for live performance. If more performers are needed, we will be contacting wider musician networks, but the focus now is to develop a group of regulars from our meetup.
If you want to be play with acconpanying bass /lead/harmony try to come early at 7PM and bring about 4 copies of 2 or 3 songs you want to play on 1 sheet per song if possible, so we can all play it.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Music Guild Open Mike!
